## Hello!

I'm a GIS Developer with a Computer Science background, currently pursuing my Master's in GIS at Hunter College. I specialize in developing geospatial solutions for renewable energy optimization, environmental conservation, and urban infrastructure planning.

**Currently:** Geospatial Data Science Intern at the National Renewable Energy Laboratory\
**Focus Areas:** WebGIS development, spatial data analysis, environmental applications
